pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creates Bivariate Maps // Contains functions to plot bivariate maps and to generate grids from shapefiles based on area coverage. For more info, see: Hidasi-Neto, J (2015) https://rfunctions.blogspot.com/2015/03/bivariate-maps- bivariatemap-function.html, Hidasi-Neto, J (2014) https://rfunctions.blogspot.com/2014/12/gridfilter-intersect- grid-with-shape.html.
